body:
These are effectively user facing because they're used for `rustup link`. So far this has worked reasonably well, but after https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/101691 `stage0-sysroot` will become user facing as well, at which point it will become extremely confusing that there's both that and `stage0`.

I suggest renaming `stage0` to `bootstrap-sysroot`, keeping stage0-sysroot as is and renaming stage1 to stage1-sysroot.

cc @bjorn3 @mark-simulacrum

_Originally posted by @jyn514 in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/101691#issuecomment-1243988456_
